author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: MovieNews | Watch: The full official trailer for 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' is here
text:
This is so good it will probably make you cry.
The full trailer for 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' was unleashed upon the world last night and at a sizeable two minutes ans 35 seconds long, it's the biggest preview of the film we've seen yet.
Featuring extended shots of Daisy Ridley's Rey, John Boyega's Finn before giving us some of Adam Driver's Kylo Ren and an ominous shot of warped and damaged Darth Vader mask, the trailer certainly implies that apart from telling us a very grand story, there's going to be a hell of a lot of action and trouble for both the Rebel Alliance and our old and new favourites.
Star Wars fans had to endure an American football match and all the stopping and starting that came with it last night as the trailer debuted on US television but mostly seem pleased with the return on all the time they invested.
If you haven't already booked your tickets, get to stepping because we've a feeling this one is going to sell out cinemas everywhere when it's released on December 17th.
Now if you'll excuse us we're going to go back and watch this another 17 times.
MORE: Watch: Domhnall Gleeson & Simon Pegg take you behind the scenes for The Force Awakens
MORE: Pics: Brand new images of The Force Awakens show an evil-looking Domhnall Gleeson
